moves.1. d4 a6: right off the bat I did not recognize this opening
moves.2. e4: my thought was to take control of the center
moves.2... c5 3. d5 d6 4. c4: Im still thinking im ok in establishing control of the center
moves.4... Nf6: the comp analysis actually says im alittle ahead
moves.5. Bg5: then of course my first blunder..comp says Nc3 is better
moves.5... Nxe4 6. Bh4: I should have retreated to e3
moves.6... g5 7. Bg3: he is already dictating where I put my pieces
moves.7... Qa5+ 8. Ke2: big mistake here..i actually looked at Nc3 but I was concerned about blacks knight on e4..
moves.8... Bg7: now my concern is he will get my rook..black has me pinned with his Queen so my moves are few
moves.9. a3 h5: according to analysis every move black makes from here on in gains an advantage
moves.10. f3 Nxg3+ 11. hxg3 Bxb2 12. Ra2 Be5 1: so far even though he is gaining an advantage..comp analysis agrees with my moves
moves.17... Bf5 18. Nb3: big mistake here ..I was just trying to threaten blacks queen...from move 11 on I was moving where black wanted me to. he told me at game end to play the board not the moves
moves.18... Qc3 19. cxb5 Qe3#: i wonder if black was cooking and doing his taxes while he played this game he certainly didn't need to think to much about my game lol...it was amazing how smooth he played
